name: UpdateExistingCheck
description:
Updates an existing deployment check.

Use this tool to update an existing check in a deployment on Vercel. Ensure that OAuth2 authentication is used to avoid errors.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the deployment to update the check for. Ensure it is a valid string.

value_schema.description: The deployment to update the check for.

parameters.name: check_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the check to be updated.

parameters.name: check_details_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for the check update, including name, path, status, conclusion, details URL, metrics, and external ID.

name.description: The name of the check being created

path.description: Path of the page that is being checked

status.description: The current status of the check

conclusion.description: The result of the check being run

detailsUrl.description: A URL a user may visit to see more information about the check

previousValue.description: Previous First Contentful Paint value to display a delta
Previous Largest Contentful Paint value to display a delta
Previous Cumulative Layout Shift value to display a delta
Previous Total Blocking Time value to display a delta

value.description: The calculated Virtual Experience Score value, between 0 and 100

previousValue.description: A previous Virtual Experience Score value to display a delta, between 0 and 100

output.description: The results of the check Run

externalId.description: An identifier that can be used as an external reference

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the request on behalf of. This identifies the team within Vercel.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The deployment to update the check for.

value_schema.description: The deployment to update the check for.

name.description: The name of the check being created

path.description: Path of the page that is being checked

status.description: The current status of the check

conclusion.description: The result of the check being run

detailsUrl.description: A URL a user may visit to see more information about the check

previousValue.description: Previous First Contentful Paint value to display a delta
Previous Largest Contentful Paint value to display a delta
Previous Cumulative Layout Shift value to display a delta
Previous Total Blocking Time value to display a delta

value.description: The calculated Virtual Experience Score value, between 0 and 100

previousValue.description: A previous Virtual Experience Score value to display a delta, between 0 and 100

output.description: The results of the check Run

externalId.description: An identifier that can be used as an external reference
